title: Ivan's Authorization
name: ivan-auth0-authz
author: ivanlim
description: This extension gives Auth0 customers the possibility to manage group memberships for their users.

auth0.uninstallConfirmMessage: You are about to uninstall the "Authorization Extension". If you proceed all your data in this extension will be lost. Do you want to continue?
auth0.scopes: create:resource_servers read:resource_servers update:resource_servers delete:resource_servers read:clients read:connections read:rules create:rules update:rules read:users update:users read:device_credentials read:logs
